name: Tender / Proposal Agent
description: Compresses large tender and proposal PDFs to meet upload size limits (typically 10–20 MB) with minimal quality loss. Preserves text crispness for official submission.
rationale: Lossless profile uses pdfsizeopt with JBIG2 + PNGOUT — preserves all text and vector quality. Falls back to Ghostscript prepress if pdfsizeopt unavailable.
